column4: Can anyone help me get my xorg working with the nvidia driver?  I seem to be having trouble getting it to work.
I havent downloaded anything from nvidia's site...
I've just tried configuring via nvidia-xconfig and using that xorg.conf
If you have another solution I'm all for it.
I just want to get it working.
But I think it was enabled to begin with
since I have a wireless driver thats restricted.
then there is your problem I already asked you in ubuntu-effects :\
I started trying to fix the resolution problem, realized I was running on the vesa drivers, and havent tried anythingh else.
I'm not entirely how you mean for me to use it.  I opened it up and it shows myt wireless card.
what video card exactly do you have
